event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: One or more required services are not running
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The service is offline because it depends on a service which is not running.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The service is not running. It will remain offline until its dependencies are met, when the Solaris Service Manager will attempt to start it. Services with require-type dependencies on the service will not be started. (Use svcs -xv service_fmri to see a list of services which are waiting for the service to start.)
event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Use svcs -x dependency_fmri to determine why the dependency service is not running. Once it is running, the service will be started.
event_registry_properties.name: details
